mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT n.red_date, c.customer_name, n.sums, n.charge, total, n.remarks FROM note_ledger N, customer c WHERE n.customer_id = c.customer_id AND n.state = '지급' AND n.typelist = '지급어음' order by n.red_date asc

SELECT DISTINCT cash.red_date, c.customer_name, cash.sums, cash.charge, total, cash.remarks FROM cash_trade cash, customer c WHERE cash.customer_id = c.customer_id AND cash.typelist = '매출' order by cash.red_date asc
